meanings.definition: One who steals in small quantities.
meanings.sent1: The pilferer took a few coins from the jar.
meanings.sent2: The shop owner caught the pilferer stealing candy.
meanings.sent3: The pilferer tried to sneak a cookie from the jar but got caught.
meanings.sent4: The pilferer of hearts stole her affection with a smile.
meanings.sent5: The sneaky pilferer always targeted small items to avoid suspicion.

meanings.sent1: She would pilferer a cookie from the jar every night.
meanings.sent2: The thief would pilferer items from unlocked cars.
meanings.sent3: He would pilferer a sip of juice from his sister's glass.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel would pilferer nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent5: The raccoon would pilferer food from the campsite every evening.
